node.title: How popular is Steemit in Your Country
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
I was curious to know how popular is Steemit in my country India. At first I went and check the Alexa rank of Steemit.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmP6PHYSTQhFWaJ4XKSveHfGA5eKUH7Kje9CH8ojCMvz4X/image.png)

With most of the users from United States, United Kingdom, South Korea, Germany and Japan. India is nowhere to be found. If you need to check more countries you have to buy their advanced plan.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmV5jz79vPxV7SLmTNpdpEjhmQzdYkgSU13S9BaWPnHrje/image.png)

One more interesting fact I have seen for Steemit is that 32.5% users are coming search whereas 14.5% from Social

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmThzapoMsNFSxHt4gNf5evQUYSJA5kpn47w8ohwBcWtBq/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZ8rXv51Vav6YswxJ3ahfX8bZwvgvEFZs2QqaovX4U9Rk/image.png)

node.title: Corporate Life - Expectation and Reality
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
1 - Expectation

A great package & Now I can spend a lot on branded clothes & food.

Reality

No fun of having these without friends. You can't actually show off cK, USPA,Arrow in front of friends. Never enjoyed food in 7-Star or 5-Stars. Rather enjoyed a lot during B.TECH time at roadside having just 30–40 bucks in pocket or having 130/- econo meal in Mcd once a month along with all friends.

2 - Expectation 

New bike in just 3 months. Full fun.

Reality

Got the same. But nobody was there on backseat to sing stupid songs with stupid lyrics. Missed the activa bike rides of university.

3 - Expectation 

Brand new co's laptop & co's mobile with great postpaid plans, unlimited internet data.

Reality 

Now i7 , 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 2GB NVIDIA GC, 2 in 1, is just being used for SQL, PPT & EXCEL. No time to call friends. Out of 100GB 4G data hardly 2–3 GB is being used monthly. Survival on 1GB 2G was the best part of life during university.

4 - Expectation

Excel in core field.

Reality

Excel in MS-EXCEL only.

5 - Expectation 

Now I have a job & after 1 year I'll propose my university crush.

Reality

She is already a mother of 1 month child now.

6 - Expectation

Own cabin, A.C installed, free meals, free coffee etc etc.

Reality

Got fatty, instead of 6packs got family pack. Gained 14kg in 2 years & now trying to shed like anything.

7 - Expectation

Corporate parties.

Reality

Staying silent & having a glass of beer in formals is actually weird. Having 2 beer & 5 friends during university was the best part of life.

node.title: Fact #2 - Part of Fact Series
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
I will be writing 5 facts in each part of the Fact Series. This is the 2nd part of the Fact Series, please share your valuable feedback.

1 - Over the course of 3-5 years, lack of sleep can shrink your brain.

2 - We see things upside down but our brain flips it.

3 - A sapiosexual is a person who is sexually attracted to intelligence in others.

4 - Chocolate milk was invented in Jamaica.

5 - Volkswagen sold more sausages than cars in 2015.

node.title: Fact #1 - Part of Fact Series
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
I will be writing 5 facts in each part of the Fact Series. This is the first part of the Fact Series, please share your valuable feedback.

1 - Police in India get paid for having moustaches.

2 - 80% of all serious or fatal car crashes are caused by men.

3 - Walt Disney was so poor that he had to eat dog's food to survive before he became successful.

4 - Bananas are curved because they grow towards the sun.

5 - When hippos are upset, their sweat turns red.
